name: Happy coffee birthday !
description:
Wow ! I made a game ! and it works !

I hope you'll like it :)

Thank you MissMuy for the occasion !
I had no clue about what I was doing, so it doesn't make a lot of sense, it's basically "happy birthday" but with coffee. And cats.

Made with Bitsy https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy
Musique : Blue Boi by LAKEY INSPIRED https://soundcloud.com/lakeyinspired/blue-boi
